directions: Stir soup, milk, black pepper, vegetables, chicken, noodles and Parmesan cheese in 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 25 minutes or until hot. Stir.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
2 cups medium egg noodles, cooked and drained
title: Hearty Chicken and Noodle Casserole
